title: Air India Changes Profile Picture After Flight With 242 On Board Crashes

title: From U.S. to Suriname, one thing to know about every team
content: With the Gold Cup set to kick off on June 14, we provide the narratives, star names and trivia you need to know for every team in the 2025 tournament.

title: 'Pilot gave Mayday call': Air India flight crashes after takeoff in Ahmedabad; rescue ops on
content: An Air India Ahmedabad-London flight crashed shortly after takeoff from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport in Ahmedabad. The aircraft went down in the Meghani area, sending a dark plume of smoke visible for kilometers. Emergency services have rushed to the scene. As of now, there's no official confirmation on casualties or the cause of the crash.

title: Ahmedabad Air India crash: Ex-Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani among passengers
content: Former Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani was onboard the Air India flight AI171 that tragically crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport, bound for London Gatwick. The Boeing 787 Dreamliner, carrying 242 people, crashed in the Meghani area, triggering extensive rescue operations hampered by a post-crash fire intensified by the heavy fuel load.

title: AI plane with 53 British nationals crashes; UK PM calls it ‘devastating’
content: Following the devastating Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer expressed his condolences, stating his thoughts are with the passengers and their families during this distressing time. The London-bound flight carried 52 British nationals.

title: Air India plane crash: What Flightradar data tells; Signal from the aircraft was lost within ...
content: Tragedy struck Meghani Nagar as Air India Flight AI171, a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner en route to London, crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad. Carrying 230 passengers and 12 crew members, the flight issued a distress call before losing contact. The crash triggered a massive emergency response as thick smoke billowed from the site.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Authorities issue helpline numbers
content: Following the Air India plane crash in Gujarat shortly after takeoff, both Air India and the civil aviation ministry promptly released helpline numbers for public assistance. Air India established a dedicated passenger hotline, 1800 5691 444, while the civil aviation ministry activated helpline 9974111327.

title: AI plane crash: IndiGo, SpiceJet issue advisories; Ahmedabad airport shut
content: Flight operations at Ahmedabad Airport are suspended after an Air India plane crashed shortly after takeoff on Thursday. IndiGo and SpiceJet have issued travel advisories, offering rebooking or refunds.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: What is Blackbox; what makes it crucial evidence
content: An Air India flight AI-171, a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, crashed after taking off from Ahmedabad airport. The flight was headed to London Gatwick. All 242 people on board are feared dead. Rescue operations are underway. Investigators are prioritizing the recovery of the black box. The black box holds vital clues to determine the cause of the crash.

title: IND vs ENG: Interesting facts about all 5 venues; some may amaze you
content: India's 2025 tour of England marks a generational shift with Shubman Gill captaining a team facing tough English conditions. England aims to dominate this red-ball season, including the Ashes. The series will be held across five historic venues, each with unique stories, from Headingley's football mishap to The Oval hosting England's first Test.

title: 'Father led 4 young sons to railway tracks': Before Faridabad horror, a calm & routine morning
content: In Faridabad, Manoj Mehto took his four sons to railway tracks. He bought them chips and cola. Then, he held them firmly as the Golden Temple Express approached. The train ran them over, killing them all. Police are investigating the motive. Preeti, Manoj's wife, is left alone. Neighbors are shocked and offer condolences.

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang: There’s a new programming language. It is called…
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently highlighted AI's transformative potential, stating it democratizes programming by enabling users to instruct computers using natural language. He likened programming AI to guiding a person, emphasizing the ease with which AI can now perform complex tasks like writing poems.

title: Air India plane crash: Railways to run special trains for stranded passengers
content: An Air India plane crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport, leading to a temporary suspension of all flight operations. Indian Railways will operate special air-conditioned trains to transport stranded passengers. Flight AI 171, bound for London Gatwick, crashed outside the airport boundary after issuing a mayday signal.

title: Bengaluru stampede: Karnataka HC grants interim bail to RCB official; orders surrendering of passport
content: The Karnataka High Court has granted interim release to four individuals, including Royal Challengers Bengaluru's marketing head, Nikhil Sosale, who were arrested in connection with the Bengaluru stampede during RCB's victory parade. The court ordered their release from judicial custody, stipulating the surrender of their passports.

title: 'Dead bodies scattered all over': Eyewitness on Ahmedabad plane crash
content: Tragedy struck Ahmedabad as an Air India flight, en route to London, crashed shortly after takeoff from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport. The aircraft plummeted into a hostel in the Meghani area, resulting in a massive fire and widespread debris. Eyewitnesses reported a scene of devastation with smoke, scattered debris, and casualties.

title: 'Thug Life' box office collection day 8 (live)
content: Mani Ratnam's 'Thug Life,' starring Kamal Haasan, had a grand opening. Silambarasan's performance received praise. However, the film experienced a significant drop in collections after the opening weekend. Weekday earnings declined considerably. The film's OTT rights are with Netflix. Poor box office performance may lead to an earlier digital release than anticipated. The movie features music by AR Rahman.

title: UP shocker: Cop throws 16-year-old off roof after she complains of harassment; critical
content: In Lucknow's Chinhat area, a 16-year-old girl suffered severe spinal injuries after allegedly being thrown off a roof by a policeman, Mukesh Yadav, who has been arrested. The girl's mother alleges Yadav harassed her daughter and assaulted the family along with his wife and brother-in-law, leading to the incident.

title: Watch: Moment Air India plane crashed near Ahmedabad airport
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, en route from Ahmedabad to London, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff in the Meghani area. Carrying over 240 passengers, the wide-body aircraft's heavy fuel load intensified the post-crash fire, hindering rescue operations. Authorities, including the DGCA and Boeing, have launched investigations, while the central government pledges full support to Gujarat in managing the disaster.

title: Nifty50 goes below 24,900; Sensex sinks 900 points - Top 5 reasons stock market is falling
content: Stock market crash today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, tanked in trade on Thursday. While Nifty50 went below 24,900, BSE Sensex tanked over 900 points intraday.

title: Ahmedabad airport closed for flight operations
content: A major incident occurred in Ahmedabad. An Air India flight AI171, bound for London, crashed after takeoff. The Boeing 787 Dreamliner went down in the Meghaninagar area. Airport operations are suspended. Emergency services responded quickly. Many casualties are feared. Injured passengers are receiving treatment at the city civil hospital. Air India is gathering more information about the incident.

title: 'We are ready': Iran’s veiled warning on reports of Israel preparing strike
content: Amid heightened regional tensions, Israel is reportedly prepared to launch an operation into Iran, prompting US concerns about potential retaliation against American sites in Iraq. The US State Department has advised non-emergency personnel to leave Iraq, while President Trump asserts that Iran cannot possess nuclear weapons.

title: Netflix to release Jerry Jones, Dallas Cowboys documentary series on August 19
content: Netflix is set to release a documentary series, 'America's Team: The Gambler and His Cowboys,' on August 19, chronicling Jerry Jones' acquisition and transformation of the Dallas Cowboys into an NFL powerhouse. The series features insights from key figures like Troy Aikman, Emmitt Smith, and Jimmy Johnson, alongside a special appearance by George W. Bush.

title: Ahmedabad crash: Air India flight lost signal at 625 feet, within a minute of takeoff
content: An Air India flight AI171 bound for London Gatwick crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport on Thursday, impacting a residential area in Meghaninagar. The crash occurred around 2:00 pm, with the aircraft losing signal at a low altitude. Rescue operations are underway, with multiple fire tenders deployed to control the blaze.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: 'Deeply anguished' - Sports fraternity reacts
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, flight AI171, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, bound for London Gatwick. The crash into a populated area resulted in a massive fire, with 242 people onboard. Rescue operations are underway as authorities investigate the cause, while the nation mourns the devastating loss and offers support to affected families.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: AI pilot gave Mayday call; ATC response went unanswered
content: An Air India B787, flight AI-171, crashed immediately after takeoff from Ahmedabad, en route to Gatwick. The Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) reported 242 individuals were aboard. The aircraft, commanded by Captain Sumeet Sabharwal, issued a MAYDAY call before losing contact with ATC.

title: Air India Ahmedabad-London Gatwick plane crash; here's what airlines said
content: Air India flight AI171, en route from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick, was involved in a crash shortly after takeoff on June 12, 2025. The Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, carrying 242 individuals, including crew, experienced the incident. The Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) confirmed the crash and deployed NDRF teams to the Ahmedabad airport crash site.

title: Woman strangled, found in bedsheet-wrapped suitcase in Ghaziabad
content: Ghaziabad police have registered a murder case after a woman's body was discovered in a suitcase along Canal Road. The autopsy revealed the cause of death to be strangulation and suffocation. Authorities believe the woman, approximately 25 years old, was murdered on Monday night, and four teams have been formed to investigate, focusing on CCTV footage and identifying the victim.

title: ‘Villa, flats, 19 plots, 16-acre land, gold, crores in bank’: Telangana engineer held
content: Anti-Corruption Bureau teams raided the residence of Nune Sridhar, a senior irrigation engineer involved in the Kaleshwaram Lift Irrigation Project, unearthing assets worth approximately ₹60 crore disproportionate to his known income sources. Sridhar, who previously supervised the Gayathri pump house, was arrested following searches at 14 locations across multiple cities. The raids occurred amidst an inquiry into alleged KLIP irregularities.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Pilot issued Mayday call before crash; what is it?
content: An Air India flight AI171, en route from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff on June 12, 2025. The pilot, Captain Sumeet Sabharwal, issued a Mayday call before the Boeing 787, carrying 242 individuals, lost contact with air traffic control.

title: Global religious landscape: Muslims and atheists grew fastest; Christians still largest group
content: A recent report analyzing global religious trends reveals Islam as the fastest-growing religion, while Christianity experiences a decline in growth despite remaining the largest. The religiously unaffiliated population also saw an increase, driven by religious switching and a rise in individuals with no religious affiliation. Other major religions like Hinduism and Judaism experienced growth in line with the overall population.

title: Patna hit-and-run: Woman constable dies, 2 other policemen injured
content: In Patna, a tragic incident occurred near Srikrishna Puri. A speeding vehicle crashed into a routine vehicle check. A woman constable, Komal, lost her life. Two other police officers, Deepak Kumar and Awdesh Kumar, sustained injuries. They were checking vehicles on Atal Path. Police arrested two passengers from the responsible car. The injured officers are receiving treatment.

title: Why Mexican flag flew high at Los Angeles protests - explained
content: In Los Angeles, protests against ICE raids saw demonstrators burning self-driving taxis and confronting police, prominently displaying the Mexican flag. This symbol, reminiscent of past protests against anti-immigrant measures like Proposition 187, represents opposition to deportation policies and solidarity with the immigrant community.

title: Meghalaya honeymoon murder rerun: UP woman kills husband 18 years after marriage
content: In Siddharthnagar, Sangeeta Devi and her lover, Anil Shukla, were arrested for murdering Sangeeta's husband, Kannan Kumar. Sangeeta poisoned Kannan after a temple visit and, with Anil, threw his body into the Rapti river. She then filed a missing person report, but inconsistencies led to her confession. Kannan's brother had already suspected foul play due to marital issues.

title: Honeymoon horror: How mangalsutra, ring left at homestay helped cops crack case
content: Police solved the murder case of Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi. He was killed during his honeymoon in Meghalaya. His wife, Sonam, and her boyfriend are suspects. A mangalsutra and ring left behind were key clues. The body was found near Weisawdong Falls. Sonam surrendered in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh. Police arrested her boyfriend and three contract killers.

title: Bangladesh's Yunus asked Modi to stop Hasina from speaking - how PM responded
content: Mohammad Yunus, chief advisor to Bangladesh's interim government, revealed at Chatham House that he requested PM Modi to restrain Sheikh Hasina's communications after she sought refuge in India. Yunus expressed concern over alleged fake news from Indian media fueling unease in Bangladesh.

title: BCCI to discuss norms for IPL victory celebrations after Bengaluru stampede; RCB ban not on cards
content: Following a tragic stampede after RCB's IPL victory celebrations, the BCCI will discuss standard guidelines for such events in its Apex Council meeting on June 14. While RCB faces no punishment, the board aims to prevent future incidents.

title: Who is Kamal Kaur? Popular Punjabi influencer found dead in car
content: Punjab Police are investigating the murder of Instagram influencer Kamal Kaur, whose body was discovered in a locked car near Adesh Medical University in Bathinda. Kaur, known for her explicit content and online controversies, had over 3.83 lakh followers. Police suspect she was killed elsewhere and her body was dumped, exploring potential links to prior threats she received.

title: Middle East: Is Israel ready to hit Iran's nuclear sites? US braces for fallout
content: Tensions escalate as Israel prepares for a potential military operation against Iran. This move could disrupt diplomacy and trigger regional conflict. US intelligence suggests Iran is nearing nuclear weapon capability. Diplomatic talks are stalling. The US is bracing for Israeli action. Retaliatory strikes against US assets are a concern. Oil markets are reacting to the rising tensions.

title: 52-yr-old school rivalry resurfaces; men in 60s assault Class 4 classmate
content: A decades-old schoolyard fight in Kasaragod has reignited after 52 years, leading to a violent confrontation. Balakrishnan, 62, allegedly attacked his former classmate, V J Babu, over a quarrel from their Class IV days. Babu sustained injuries, including lost teeth, after Balakrishnan and another classmate, Mathew, confronted him.

title: KL Rahul has special message to Karun Nair ahead of England series
content: KL Rahul has voiced his support for Karun Nair, who makes a comeback to the Indian Test squad after eight years, citing impressive domestic and county cricket performances. Nair's recent stint with Northampton and a double century for India A highlight his form.

title: Delhi boils: Temperature feels like 52°C; IMD issues 'red' alert for today
content: Delhi is experiencing a severe heatwave. The temperature felt like 51.9 degrees Celsius. The weather department issued a red alert for Thursday. A yellow alert is in place for Friday. Rain and thunderstorms are expected on Friday. Respite from the heat is anticipated from June 13. Moisture-laden winds from the Bay of Bengal and the Arabian Sea will bring relief.

title: Covid-19 without vaccine: How many people would have died? A thought experiment
content: Imagine a world without COVID-19 vaccines: a terrifying reality of endless variants, overwhelmed hospitals, and economies in ruins. Lockdowns persist indefinitely, schools struggle, and mental health declines. Millions more lives would be lost, healthcare systems would collapse, and society would be trapped in a cycle of fear and isolation, highlighting the vital role vaccines played in averting disaster.

content: Kayla Harrison becomes the new women's bantamweight champion . she finished Julianna Pea with a beautiful second-round Kimura . pea falls to no. 2 in the men's championship rematch .

title: What to know ahead of the Canadian Grand Prix
content: Max Verstappen could be under pressure this weekend at the Canadian grand prix . he is just one penalty point from a race ban following the incident with George Russell in Spain . the forecast for the 44th race at Montreal is set to be cloudy on Friday .

title: Adams: U.S. tunes out Donovan, Dempsey 'noise'
content: Mauricio Pochettino and Clint Dempsey are among those criticizing the men's national team . the pair share the american goals record with 57 goals each . "we don't talk about that internally as a group," Adams said during a Zoom interview .

title: Oakmont is going to be the main character at the 2025 U.S. Open
content: oakmont Country Club has hosted 10 U.S. Opens now -- the most of any course in the country . the clubhouse is dotted with quaint homes . it's a barrier between the idyllic neighborhood and one of golf's most terrifying tests .

title: NCAA baseball tournament schedule, results
content: the field for the men's college world series in Omaha, Nebraska, is set . it'll be the Racers' first time in Omaha . four teams are making their first appearances in Omaha since winning the title the last time they made it this far .

title: 'He's all-in': How Aaron Rodgers got acclimated in his first week with the Steelers
content: new: "you broke my heart in the Super Bowl, but I forgive you," he says . new: the 40-year-old has been greeting players at mandatory minicamp for the past five years . the steelers quarterback is a polarizine . he's a longtime fan of the Steelers .

title: How Sam Bennett transformed into a playoff MVP candidate
content: Florida Panthers goaltender Sam Bennett tucks in the breakaway vs. the Oilers . it began with a backcheck and a thundering hit on oilers forward Vasily Podkolzin . Bennett blew past everyone to accept a pass for a breakaway on Stuart Skinner . the puck was frozen in place as Bennett deposited the puck behind him for the fourth goal .

title: College football's top 25 plays since 2000

title: Future Power Rankings: How all 68 Power 4 college football teams stack up
content: college football 's future power rankings have been reimagined as part of a changing sport . the rankings will examine the next two seasons -- in this case, the 2025 and 2026 seasons -- and function more as a snapshot of the landscape . a spring portal changes things, and QB rooms can look moderately or significantly different by late May or early June .

title: Tigers' Jobe needs season-ending elbow surgery
content: rookie pitcher Jackson Jobe will undergo season-ending surgery on his right elbow . jobe was 4-1 with a 4.22 ERA in 10 starts this year . the right-hander felt discomfort in the elbow during a start against the visiting San Francisco Giants .

title: NBA Finals: Biggest takeaways from Pacers' first home win over Thunder
content: Oklahoma City Thunder vs. Indiana Pacers: Game Highlights (2:18) a longtime scout texted one sentence: "this is the first game that's felt like a Finals game" the series arrived in the Hoosier State tied at a game apiece . the Pacers had led for 94 of the first 96 minutes of the series .
